content.rendered:
COURSE SEARCH

Access + institutions, worldwide

Stay ahead of the competition with access to leading and popular institutions around the world. Growing daily.

Australia  .  USA  .  Canada  .  Europe  .  New Zealand  .  Asia  .  UK  .  

01

Easily view scholarships

Offer your students visibility of the scholarships an institution offers – including exclusive scholarships.

02

Institution list growing daily

We’re continually negotiating new partnerships, so you don’t have to.

03

Recruit for every student need

Universities, high schools, pathway programs, all accessible in Course Search.

04

Search for courses in one click

Access 80,000+ courses at the click of a button. Plus, advanced filtering tools to find the best options for your student.

05

Match your students with eligible options

Our Course Search allows you to find personalised course options for your student, instantly.

Trusted by 7,000+ recruiters worldwide

“The platform has brought many world-class institutions within the reach of consultants like me who found it difficult to market their company and product in dearth of direct representation….The pain of communication with different colleges and universities has decreased exponentially since the Adventus.io team takes care of it on our behalf.”

INTEGRATE INC – INDIA

FREQUENTLY ASKED

Your questions answered

I want to access institutions not in your directory. What can you do?

We’re always adding new institutions to the platform for our customers. If you have a particular institution you would like to access, simply let us know through our Helpdesk and we will add it to our priority list of institutions to seek out for partnership.

Can I trust your information on courses and institutions is up-to-date?

Yes. We have an experienced and extensive data entry team that updates the platform with all the current information about institutions and their courses.

Do you have details about scholarships?

Yes. Every scholarship an institution offers is available on the platform. We give you complete transparency.
